hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
cd $WORKSPACE export VECTORCAST_DIR=/home/vectorindia/vcast_64u export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/vectorindia/vector-license/vector-VECTORINDIA.lic export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH echo $VECTORCAST_DIR $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version
cp -R /home/vectorindia/firefox/firefox $WORKSPACE echo $PWD cd firefox ./make_config echo "---- Results for Version:$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version " >> ../../firefox_results
./$WORKSPACE/firefox/metricscmd
time vcshell --metrics make -j4
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics >> ../../firefox_results
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb clearmetrics
./$WORKSPACE/firefox/utilmetricscmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
$VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics >> ../../firefox_results
./$WORKSPACE/firefox/utilqikcmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
./$WORKSPACE/firefox/utilinstcmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
./$WORKSPACE/firefox/utilincrinstcmd
cat timings >> ../../firefox_results
